title: Taxi Taxi Song Lyrics Sakkarakatti
stanzas:
Taxi Taxi Song Lyrics Sakkarakatti
#ARRahman #BennyDayal #Blaaze

hahaa heyhey..
nanba nee oru ilavasa taxi
nanba nee oru ilavasa taxi

once upon a time
when we were riding real easy
only we used
our new maruthi
look up on the sides
when a citi girl pass by
bale bale you say
bye bye bye

se bale bale
se hole hole
se oye oye
shaavaa

rasi rasi
nanban kidaithal
yellam oasi
taxi taxi
nanba nee oru
ilavasa taxi (2)

nee nee nee nee illayel
naan naan naan engu povathu
thoal saaya thoal illayel
en vaazhkai ennavathu

rasi rasi
nanban kidaithal
yellam oasi
taxi taxi
nanba nee oru
ilavasa taxi

oolaa oolaa
nanban kidaithal
yellam oasi
oolaa oolaa
yosi yosi..

we’ve gonna a smile coz
we have a journey
dinner with a lady
in a red saree
shout out loud,
say you’re so sweet

we’ve gonna a smile
coz we have a journey
dinner with a lady
in a red sareeyaa..
oolaa oolaa

en thavarai nee maraithaai
enakai archanai vaanginaai
un thoalgal yaeniyai poal
yaeri midithen thanginaai

ezhum poathu kai thandhu
azhum poathu kadan thandhu
ilaipaara madi thandhu
enkena vaazhvathu nee thaane

rasi rasi nanban
kidaithal yellam osi
taxi taxi nanba
nee oru ilavasa taxi

thillaanaa thillaanaa
thimiru pudicha thillaanaa…
anbaanaa anbaanaa
adangamaataen hero naan

kalla thanam theriyaathu
kaadhaliye kidaiyaathu

kanjathanam theriyaadhu
kanjaave kidayaadhu
nalla pazham kidayaadhu
gnana pazham kidayaadhu
en uyir nanban nee thaane

rasi rasi nanban
kidaithal yellam osi
taxi taxi nanba
nee oru ilavasa taxi

nee nee nee nee illayel
naan naan naan engu povathu
thoal saaya thoal illayel
en vaazhkai ennavathu
ennavathu ennavathu

taxi taxi..
awesome taxi…
taxi taxi…
raasi raasi…
”rap” ae jaasthi…

taxi taxi…
taxi taxi…
make the wave…
make the sound…

taxi taxi…
kumbakumengum city city
thinam thinam
engal tire kaatchi

group boys naangal
king of the streets
live people gather
every body follow me…

look up in the side
when ya see u when u pass by
friend thavira friends thavira
stay with me all at the time
going through the streets
thavira they must they must ask why
we’ll be so happy as
we know that we’are nice guy
